arts.ttl: Serie A | Bologna 0-0 Torino: Possession proves futile
arts.sum: Bologna dominated possession, but it was Torino who had the best chance to win with...

Bologna come into the match having not tasted defeat in seven games. Their 2-2 draw with Fiorentina at the weekend ended three straight victories. Torino come here in great form. Their 2-1 win over G...
